void perfevl (SIM_T *simu)
 Evaluate performance by calling perfevl_ievl in parallel and then calls perfevl_mean to field average.

Detailed Description

Peformance evaluation on science FoV.

Notice that the science FoV can be different from the DM fitting FoV, which is tuned to better sharpen the NGS

Todo:
Write a standalone routine that can plot results, using techniques developped in drawdaemon.
